subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Under the terms of the deal, Mikhail D. Prokhorov would invest $200 million for an 80 percent stake in the team and a 45 percent interest in its new arena.
snippet: Under the terms of the deal, Mikhail D. Prokhorov would invest $200 million for an 80 percent stake in the team and a 45 percent interest in its new arena.
